title: Display contact number in booking interface

requirements.summary: Add contact phone number to the Layout header for visibility across all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Contact phone number is displayed in the header or footer of the application
Phone number is clearly visible and formatted for easy reading
Number remains accessible on all pages of the application

file_operations.description: Add a contact information section to the header displaying the business phone number prominently. Include appropriate styling and formatting to make it clearly visible. Ensure the phone number remains accessible on all pages since this Layout component wraps all application content.
